translation.titlelogin: Sign up to view your achievements
translation.overonsbeschrijving: This app was created and developed by students of the Summa College. This app will ensure that students from Summa College will exercise more instead of sitting behind the laptop. Summa Move contains all kinds of exercises and different ones. The exercises can be found at the bottom of the navigation bar under exercises.
translation.overonshelp: For help click the help button at the top right
